configuration.name: 客户投诉情况--项目类型
configuration.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (p.c_category=NULL OR p.c_category='') THEN '未知' ELSE p.c_category END,COUNT(cc.c_customer_id+cc.c_complaint_id) FROM t_customer_complaint cc INNER JOIN t_customer c ON cc.c_customer_id=c.c_id INNER JOIN t_project p ON p.c_customer_id=c.c_id INNER JOIN t_dict_complaint d ON d.c_id=cc.c_complaint_id WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY p.c_category
